attributes.action: Do not make it the law that care workers must be double vaccinated to work
attributes.additional_details: So many care workers will leave there jobs if forced to take the jab leaving an already under staffed sector even more in peril. It’s a basic human right to make a choice and that choice is being taken away. With mostly all the elderly in care homes having taken the jab, and workers required to take LFT and PCR tests multiple times a week (as well as PPE) the chances of coronavirus outbreak as low. Do not take the choice away.
attributes.background: It is currently being discussed in Parliament for it to be the law that all care workers/care assistants to be double jabbed in order to work. It’s forcing a percentage of workers to go against there basic human rights in order to keep there jobs. Abolish the law, just keep it as mandatory.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
